sentences.en: And of all the animals that humans eat, none are held the ones that moo.
sentences.cn: 而在人类食用的牲畜中, 牛是在温室气体排放上首当其冲的.

sentences.en: Cows on the bus sing. Moo! Moo Moo!
sentences.cn: 牛在公共汽车上唱歌. 哞! 哞!哞!

sentences.en: It is a practical and effective MOO method.
sentences.cn: 它是一种有效的、实用的多目标优化方法.

sentences.en: Moo mini - cards are cooler than regular business cards, because they're small and attention - grabbing .
sentences.cn: 小型 Moo 卡比一般的商业名片要酷, 因为它们更小,更容易吸引别人的眼球.

sentences.en: Opinion polls indicate Roh Moo Hyun will survive the referendum.
sentences.cn: 不过民调显示卢武弦将会赢得公投.

sentences.en: South Korea's former president Roh Moo - Hyun has died after a fall while mountain climbing.
sentences.cn: 韩国前总统卢武铉在爬山时坠落身亡.

sentences.en: South Korea's president, Roh Moo - hyun , is due to visit Beijing on October 13 th.
sentences.cn: 韩国总统卢武铉定于10月13日访问北京.

sentences.en: Tauren Male - " Moo . Are you happy now? "
sentences.cn: 哞. 你现在开心了 吗 .

sentences.en: The complex MoO _ 2 CI _ 2 ( C _ 4 H _ 3 OCOOH ) _ 2 was prepared by the reaction of MoCI _ 5 with C _ 4 H _ 3 OCOOH in chlorobenzene.
sentences.cn: 使MoCl_5与C_4H_3OCOOH在氯苯溶剂中反应,合成了新的过渡金属钼配合物MoO_ 2Cl_2 ( C_4H_3OCOOH ) _2.

sentences.en: The cow asks the horse, Moo, where s John, the farmer?
sentences.cn: 母牛问马说, “哞, 农夫约翰在哪儿? ”

sentences.en: With a moo moo here and moo there.
sentences.cn: 这里哞哞叫,那里也哞哞叫.

sentences.en: You're a cow, moo, moo, moo.
sentences.cn: 你是一只牛, 哞, 哞, 哞.

trans.tran_en: if a cow moos, it makes a long low sound
